item.description:
The featured comic is Rob Steen from Late Night with David Letterman

Also features Pat Napoli and Robin Bornstein.

I have heard they are totally hilarious and with a dinner and show for $10 how can we go wrong!

(IMPORTANT - ONLY "YES" RSVP's to this posting can get this deal. If you want to go you must RSVP yes by 2:00 Friday as they are reserving seats for us. Walk-in's at this price are not allowable.)

Space is limited so if full I will e-mail you back asap. You MUST mention you are with this Meet Up group AND have RSVP'd here to get this special price.

This is a special deal sponsored by Dollar Mouse to get us the half-off deal.

EASY DIRECTIONS (Off exit 55, Rt 95)

Off Rt 95:
if traveling northbound:

take a right off the exit and go about 200 yards (5 to 10 seconds) and you will see the restaurant on the left in the strip mall.

Off Rt 95:
if traveling southbound:
take a left off the exit and go about 600 yards (15 to 20 seconds) and you will see the restaurant on the left in the strip mall.


I look forward to meeting some of you all and having a blast! See you there.
item.name: Comedy - Dinner & Show [$30 VALUE FOR $15]
